entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fuzzlyn: Debug/Release diffs for `Avx.Test*` intrinsics #107328
    9.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn: Debug/Release diffs for `LeadingZeroCount` and `TrailingZeroCount` intrinsics #107327
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'unreached' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #107324
  • Asking JIT not to align loops triggers multiple asserts #107319
  • [Mono] NetTrace Collected mismatches expected CLR Instance name #107315
    10.0.0
  • [Wasm] Support for the mono log profiler for memory profiling #107312
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters CI failure. #107309
  • [API Proposal]: `NumberStyles.OctalNumber` #107306
  • CA2000 Dispose warning suppressed by GetRequiredService #107303
  • [NativeAOT] NativeAOT .NET 9 preview 7 apps hang due to generating infinite loops for certain `typeof` comparisons #107300
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonStringEnumConverter handles duplicate enum members inconsistently #107296
  • HttpClientHandler ClientCertificates ignored on HTTP 3 #107294
  • `PriorityQueue<TElement, TPriority>.Remove` method violates min-heap invariant #107292
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator added *.XmlSerialization.all to nuget package which causes CS0436 #107288
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.pdb not found #107285
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 16 Regressions on 8/28/2024 6:34:28 PM #107302
    9.0.0
  • Branch target alignment on Apple Silicon #107284
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Host with AsyncServiceScope Services #107281
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 8/29/2024 2:08:41 AM #107304
  • JSON deserialization errors with response.Content.ReadFromJsonAsync<List<T>> where JsonSerializer.Deserialize works fine #107279
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 8/29/2024 5:45:13 PM #107305
  • [API Proposal]: System.Convert base on ReadOnlySpan<char> #107276
  • System.Text.Json serialization bug on virtual/override properties. #107273
  • System.Text.Json should not be installed successfully on netcoreapp3.1 #107271
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Guid` shall declare `IEqualityOperators<Guid, Guid, bool>` #107270
  • Analyzer to help avoid public usage of `lock(this)` #107269
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Personal) returns different path for Xamarin.Forms and for MAUI on Android #102110
  • PhysicalFileProvider allows access to files inside excluded directories #107299
    Future
  • [DependencyInjection] IServiceProvider GetService(s) behavior differences #107153
  • Blazor Standalone WASM - Debugging Breaks after OIDC Authentication #91197
    8.0.0
  • DispatchProxy generates methods for final interface methods #107287
  • .net 8 AOT Published files Windows run with environment variable do not work #107227
  • Test failure:JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_39424/Runtime_39424/Runtime_39424.cmd #107008
  • [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)] causes "Could not load type because the format is invalid" error in derived class on coreclr #107192
  • Proposer #if #else statement does not work with attributes #107262
  • Inliner: look at block weight allocation in inlinees #6096
    Future
  • JIT: cleanup box/unbox/copy after known successful type equality check #9037
    Future
  • JIT: refactor edge weight representation #46885
    Future
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'intrin.op3->IsVectorZero()' during 'Generate code' #106872
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Bad codegen with `TestFirstTrue` #106871
    9.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed '!"Got unexpected instruction format after MOVPRFX"' during 'Emit code' #106868
    9.0.0
  • NuGet restore failing with NullReferenceException #103823
    9.0.0
  • LdapConnection Modify Request Under Linux/AOT Fails with Encoding Error #106412
    9.0.0
  • [HttpStress] Stress builds are broken on windows #106694
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Packaging API returns non-seekable stream #28258
  • ZipPackage/ZipArchive seems to have issues when reading ZIP files generated by .Net Framework #26955
  • System.IO.Packaging has no way to support private keys that are external #28811
  • Nested types do not respect TypeNameParseOptions.MaxNodes #106991
    9.0.0
  • Performance Gap Between Fields and Properties in System.Text.Json #107275
  • wasi project with long path results in error clang linking on Windows #106845
    10.0.0
  • how can i ignore [JsonProperty] force when i use System.Text.Json #107272
  • [Analyzer] Lift arrays of literals to static fields #78398
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Put handling of sized ref handles under FEATURE_SIZED_REF_HANDLES #107326
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Implement MONO_MEMORY_BARRIER in jiterpreter #107325
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Generate bailouts for switch opcodes in jiterpreter instead of aborting #107323
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT ARM64: Don't emit `mov` for zero case in jump tables for shift intrinsics #107322
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix bug in validating unused bits #107321
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory
  • Fix getting SSP for threadabort in funceval #107320
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Make jiterpreter module size limit configurable + clean up technical debt #107318
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Empty slice fix #107316
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [release/9.0] Fix string case-insensitive comparisons in Globalization invariant mode #107311
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Replace UseSystemResourceKeys substitution with FeatureSwitchDefinition #107310
    needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0] Disable MemoryStream_SeekOverflow_Throws on Linux #107298
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO
  • [release/9.0] Update size of LDAP `BerVal.bv_len` struct on unix #107295
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [browser][host] Include system environment variables when resolving ASPNETCORE_URLS #107293
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Update ABI doc #107286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Track GC info accurately into epilogs in codegen #107283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Debug missing MicrosoftNetCoreAppRuntimePackDir #107280
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CacheTests #107278
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add $(crossArg) to superpmi-collect-job #107277
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix string case-insensitive comparisons in Globalization invariant mode #107268
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Define a merged runner for the profiler tests #107200
    area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • Convert ilasm unit tests to use one "merged" runner #107167
    area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • [PERF] Fix runtime-wasm-perf pipeline prereq install failure #107317
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasi][Windows] SingleFilebundle project with long path results in linking error #107253
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Add documentation for VBS in CngKeyCreationOptions #107301
    documentation, area-System.Security
  • Fix IntelliSense for gc.cpp #105768
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix bug in validating unused bits #106771
    area-System.Memory
  • Move handle store and remaining crsts from `BaseDomain` to `AppDomain` #107208
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [TypeName] Nested types should respect MaxNode count #106334
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, binaryformatter-migration, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix test build failure #107274
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • Avoid crash if klass is null #107177
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix Windows HttpStress runs on pipelines #107178
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Avoid combining conditional select for reduction instrinsics #107207
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Increase timeout for fullAOT jobs #106955
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update size of LDAP `BerVal.bv_len` struct on unix #107142
    area-System.DirectoryServices, 10.0.0
  • Improve AssemblyNameInfo Fuzzer #107257
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, test-enhancement
  • Fix LDR/STR->LDP/STP peephole with SP-based addressing #107255
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Fix some minor errors #107179
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix meter/instrument filtering in MetricsEventSource #107267
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • Remove Helper Method Frames for Exception, GC and Thread methods #107218
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] more cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • Improve code coverage for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #107235
    area-System.Security, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Remove PointerNativeTypeAssignmentRewriter by introducing a separate local with the exact type and assigning to/from it #107219
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • SuperPMI: ASPNET Collection job #106844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make `DomainAssembly` create its `Assembly` in its constructor and remove separate allocate load level #107224
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Use system brotli on Unix non-portable builds #107225
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow SVE ops to re-use the same registers #107084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow op inside conditionalselect to be non HWintrinsic #107180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Delay free all ops within conditional select #107036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Skip more covariance checks #107116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WASI] platform specific assemblies and fixes for testing #107196
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Mark Encoding as nullable in StreamWriter's constructor #106658
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Mono AOT] Fix error when returning zero sized struct #107198
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix hardware exception context extraction on Rosetta #107199
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.10
  • [Release/8.0-staging] Reduce net core app current package dependencies #107161
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.10
  • [WIP][mono] Try enable fullAOT-llvm arm64 CI jobs #106615
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0] Fix RunClassConstructor trim warning for Nullable<T> #107039
    Servicing-approved, area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix encoding for certain k-mask instructions #107249
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Ensure required properties are validated before invoking the deserialization constructor. #107126
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [WASI] HTTP client testing #105838
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-wasi
  • [release/9.0] Increase timeout for SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits test #107120
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, test-bug, 9.0.0
  • Pass content length into limited streams as Int64 #105481
    area-System.Net, 10.0.0
  • Use ProjectReferences in inbox src projects #106329
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix Int32 to Unsigned overflow check #107024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add FromFile to BinaryData #107231
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #106696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix stack overflow reporting with multiple PALs #107264
    area-PAL-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Stop calling morph from CSE #106695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Enable range-based for over ABI passing segments #107174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix warnings in coreclr/jit/compiler.cpp for non-Windows targets #104805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add EventSource event method generation #107176
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • check in configurations #107012
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload Sets] Running `dotnet workload restore` should install the workload set when using global.json #42582
  • dotnet restore doesn't respect the <RuntimeIdentifier> for sdk-style project. #40517
    Discussion
  • error MSB3030: (NETCORE_ENGINEERING_TELEMETRY=Build) Could not copy the file #42964
  • [Static Web Assets] DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints throws ArgumentException due to duplicate key #43033
  • Build errors with multi-targeting Razor Class Library projects that include an MSBuild target depending on the CoreBuild target. (.NET SDK 9 Preview 7) #43120
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.1.24413.1] Failed to execute command "dotnet watch run" with error "Hot Reload based watching is only supported in .NET 6.0 or newer apps" #42748
  • Daily build: blazor-wasm project build fails on NU1102: Unable to find package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly with version (>= 9.0.0-rc.2.24426.2) #43050

Updated

  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • [NETSDKE2E][Intermittent]error MSB4242: SDK Resolver Failure: "The SDK resolver "Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildWorkloadSdkResolver" failed while attempting to resolve the SDK "Microsoft.NET.SDK.WorkloadAutoIm..." displays when running command quickly in CLI #42269
  • [feature request] A way to compile and run raw `.cs` files from CLI (maybe extending `dotnet run`) in one-shot command #43086
  • Provide CLI commands for investigating the contents and available workload set versions #42367
  • Workload installation failed: Workload ID android isn't supported on this platform. #42946
  • SDK 8.0.401: `dotnet workload install wasm-tools ` does not install correctly #42919
  • Daily build: microsoft.netcore.app.runtime.mono.android-arm is not found while installing MAUI workload on .NET 9 #43049
  • Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset download check fails because NuGetPackageRoot is unset in some scenarios #43016
  • Package installation fails for unlisted package version #43013
  • RHEL9: missing dotnet-runtime-deps-8.0-8.0.8 #43009
  • dotnet tool update did not install the latest version #43089
  • Better suggestion for erroneous `dotnet new gitconfig` #43084
  • `dotnet build` ignores `/v` verbosity flag in .NET 9.0.0-preview.7 #43069
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx-rc1` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43147
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43112
  • Cleanup unnecessary branches #43106
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43104
  • global tools do not work #43171
  • Why there's no constructor defined for DateOnly and TimeOnly to take DateTime object as an input #43164
  • Empty package ID in message when running `dotnet tool update -g --all` with up-to-date packages #43158
  • Winforms/WPF .NET9.0 app cannot be ran on Windows 10 20H2(OS build 19042.2965) #43115
  • `dotnet tool install -a arm64` fails on linux-arm64 #29074
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Blazor] Fix hot reload for components with collocated JS files #43199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #43196
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Add "buildPass" parameter to vmr-build jobs templates #43193
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the extra set of testexecutiondirectory #43190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43189
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Use Defender on Linux in VMR pipeline #42996
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #43144
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43065
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • We're currently copying the test assets to the publish directory #43146
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.1xx #42746
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow roslyn binary into VMR #43162
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Setup private feeds for tests #43041
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Execute dotnet run behind the hood in dotnet test #43170
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Updated

  • Clean up some code #42775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Expose endpoint manifest type #43167
    untriaged
  • Warn when enabling Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #43039
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Fix issues with Blazor WASM delta applier #43152
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix the minimum supported version for targeting net9 #43142
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Warn when NuGetPackageRoot is empty but needed for the toolset compiler #43119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add an implicit reference to the Generate SBOM task #43151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't translate command, per the note #43159
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Static web assets] Reduce allocations on DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints #43099
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, 9.0.1xx
  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, consider-for-documentation, 9.0.1xx
  • Search version in set #43096
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools #43045
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx
  • Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43157
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Multi arch containers #43085
    Area-Containers
  • Shutdown toolset compilers #43135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: IOnceEnumerable #8401

Updated

  • Proposal: `field` keyword in properties #140
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Permit trailing commas in method signatures and invocations #391
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Field keyword/updates #8398

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Avoid dependency on `System.Index` for list patterns #74983
  • Analyzer's own satellite assemblies not available while analyzing #74981
  • IDE0072 not smart enough, and the fixer triggers CS8510 #74977
  • Source formatting options from .editorconfig are ignored in 17.12 Preview 1 #74976

Closed

  • [Feature Request] `nameof(X)u8` : Generating UTF-8 byte sequences using `nameof()` #74979
  • Use ToList for collection-exprs of a single spread #71217
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused code #74984
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #74982
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Re-enable double-to-integer conversion tests #74980
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose Go To Impl and Spell Check to Razor #74978
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Partial properties: duplicate `membersByName` before merging accessors #74969
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Field-backed properties: support partial properties with auto-implemented accessors and with initializers #74959
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Added handler for Razor Endpoint #74815
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Avoid duplicate synthesized interface members #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Improve support for TypeLibFuncFlags.FHidden attributed properties. #74962
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add `Conversion.IsSpan` public API #74731
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Fixup partial property API usage #74951
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Put TArg before callbacks #74370
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Emit generated inline array types without LayoutKind.Auto and with CompilerGeneratedAttribute #74972
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Description on FromBody parameter of route handler in Minimal API not generated in OpenAPI requestBody #57685
  • Consumes attribute/filter in controller-based app can produce inaccurate OpenAPI doc #57684
  • New ASP.Net Core/Angular project templates incompatible with Authentication Middleware #57683
  • Page calls dispose immediately after first render #57681
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json #57680
  • inconsistent file encoding in ProjectTemplates #57679
  • HttpsConnectionClosedWhenResponseDoesNotSatisfyMinimumDataRate failing on AlmaLinux8 in release/8.0 Helix Matrix #57677
  • ASP0023 Ambiguous route warning false positive with Route attribute in abstract base controller #57676
  • Perf improvement: json #57673

Closed

  • Generate schema with `readOnly: true` for computed properties and properties with `[ReadOnly(true)]` attribute #56353
    Backlog
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #57631
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/6.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #57633
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #57622
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #57623
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware, updates #57621
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #57674
  • Blazor Server App - Problem with accessing request scope in DelegatingHandler #57481
    9.0-rc2
  • Version 17.11.0 - MSAL Exception Unhandled - Blazor WASM #57489
  • After adding NuGet Package Microsoft.Extensions.Apidescription.Server to ASP.NET Web Project, build failed with error: Unable to find service type 'Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescriptions.IDocumentProvider' in loaded assemblies #56481
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #57652
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #57653
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #57654
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #57655
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicgrpcpublishaot, todosapivanilla #57656

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS, macOS] Text in the Editor control disappeared when reducing the Scale of the Editor control #24583

  • [MAUI] Navigating to 'My Recipes' shows blank page #24580
    Backlog

  • when I create a new project and search for MAUI i am getting this, even afte modifying installer #24576

Closed

  • iOS/Mac Catalyst - UNNotificationInterruptionLevel Values Incorrect (Apply same fix to Maui as for Xamarin) #24590

    Backlog

    .NET 8 SR8

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • migrationBuilder.InsertData should return SELECT scope_identity() to get LAST INSERT ID #34607
  • Invalid NavigationLazyLoading thrown when using (int) enum key type and the FK is null #34604
  • Generate migration-free SQL scripts for test cases #34603
  • [Owned Entity] Foreign keys are being dropped and added on every new migration #34600

Closed

  • SQL optimization/simplification in 9.0 #34151
    9.0.0
  • Is it possible to connect a new .netcore project to a database that already has an EF implementation? #34602
  • `IEntityType` is replaced by `ITypeBase` but I loose certain methods that I need for EfCore.SchemaCompare library #34594

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Update Mono.TextTemplating and Microsoft.CodeAnalysis to non-preview versions #34606
  • [release/9.0] Update Azure.Identity version #34605
  • In VisitUpdate, match table by alias rather than the exact same instance #34601

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Generate correct calls for complex and primitive properties in the model snapshot #34587
    tell-mode
  • [release/8.0] Update FK ElementType when the FK properties change. #34561
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Acquire the migrations database lock in a transaction. #34489
    providers-beware, tell-mode

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34581
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #34572
